name: ConsentStatus
title: consentStatus
description: HL7-code system of concepts specifying whether the consent has been sought and granted.  Used in HL7 Version 2.x messaging in the TXA and CON segments.

concepts.display: Limited - Consent has been granted with limitations
Pending - Consent has not yet been sought
Rescinded - Consent was initially granted, but was subsequently revoked or ended.
